name: This is my place
description:
This is my place - This is a fantasy war game with simple gameplay but difficult survival. Players need to upgrade facilities to obtain more resources to defend their territory. In addition to wars, players can also gain more resources or morale by playing mini-games. So how many days can you last?

War:
There are currently 14 available arms, which can be unlocked when players upgrade designated facilities.
There are 6 formations in the war. Players can change their formation at any time to gain an advantage.

Games:
There are currently 4 mini-games available for play -
Harvest grain fields, click the left mouse button or the space bar continuously to increase the grain.
To chop down trees, click the left mouse button or the space bar at the right time to cut down the trees.
Break the stones, and click on the stones on the screen within the time limit, the more stones you break, the more you will gain.
Morale training, press the correct direction key according to the indicated direction within the time limit, the more times you succeed, the more morale you will increase.

Game launch on 15/9/2023
